title: Data file
description: Schema for submitting metadata for a data file.

filename.title: File name
filename.description: The local file name used at time of submission.
filename.comment: what ends up being displayed? - accession perhaps

file_type.title: General File Type
file_type.description: General Type of File (raw, processed, alignments)

file_format_specifications.title: File format specifications documents
file_format_specifications.description: Text or pdf files that further explain the file format

items.comment: See document.json for a list of available identifiers.

md5sum.title: MD5sum
md5sum.description: The md5sum of the file being transferred.
md5sum.comment: This can vary for files of same content gzipped at different times

content_md5sum.title: Content MD5sum
content_md5sum.description: The MD5sum of the uncompressed file.
content_md5sum.comment: This is only relavant for gzipped files.

file_size.title: File size
file_size.comment: File size is specified in bytes - presumably this can be a calculated property as well

experiments.title: Experiments
experiments.description: The experiments that this file is associated with

related_files.title: Related Files
related_files.description: Related files and how they are related to this file.

items.title: Related File
items.description: A file that is related to this file with a specified type of relationship.

filesets.title: File Sets
filesets.description: File Set to which this file belongs to.

items.title: File Set
items.description: A file set to be associated with this file.

quality_metric.title: QC Metric
quality_metric.description: A particular QC metric associated with this flag.

restricted.title: Restricted file
restricted.description: A flag to indicate whether this file is subject to restricted access
